name: Zoho Assist
description: Simple and Secure Remote Support Tool
overview:
Zoho Assist is an online, web based remote support service from Zohoâ€™s range of business solutions. With Zoho Assist, users can create remote support sessions on the fly with their clients or colleagues anywhere on the world. Joining a session requires a few clicks and happens within minutes. No Installation is required. Users can also generate reports of the sessions, transfer files with the remote computer and chat with the remote client.

It’s available in 19 languages and absolutely secure with all the transmissions adhering to industry standard SSL/128-bit AES encryption protocols. It’s also US/EU Safe Harbour Compliant. The pricing of the product starts at 12$/month.
